subject: USA DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SEC
body:
USA DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY
ANTI-TERRORIST AND MONETARY CRIMES DIVISION
NEW YORK FIELD OFFICE
26 Federal Plaza
9th Floor, Suite 9-110
New York, NY 10278
ATTENTION BENEFICIARY
Your package delivery was approved since the beginning of this year we (DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY) has instructed you before to contact the dhl for the delivery without knowing you didn't contact them, i was surprised when i got call from dhl saying that you haven't reach them for the delivery. You have to contact them now so that the delivery doesn't delay because that package of yours has over stayed in their custody. Contact dhl now with your full address for the delivery 
the only fee you will pay to them is $100 USD only
.
This is how you will collect your package. Contact DHL on the information below and ask them about your package delivery. Tell them I sent you to them and I am sure they will understand. 
Remember you will have to pay them only $100 USD or you pay by Apple card to complete the delivery to your address
 contact them now on the info below. Don't forget you have to send $100 USD or you pay with Apple card or steam wallet card to them to complete the delivery to you, contact them with your full information to enable them to continue with your delivery.
CONTACT DHL ON THIS INFORMATION BELOW FOR THE DELIVERY.
CONTACT PERSON: Dhl Director Mr mike pence
EMAIL ADDRESS: (
mrmikepence@zohomail.com
)
WE AWAIT YOUR URGENT REPLY
BEST REGARDS
Special Agent Danny Bray
DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY
ANTI-TERRORIST AND MONETARY CRIMES DIVISION
NEW YORK FIELD OFFICE
Note: Disregard any email you get from any impostors or offices claiming to be in possession of your ATM card, 
you are hereby advice only to be in contact with Mr James Ben  who is the rightful person to deal with in regards to your payment
 and forward any emails you get from impostors to this office so we could act upon it immediately.Help stop cyber crime

subject: Re: USA DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SEC
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding my package delivery. I apologize for not contacting DHL earlier, as I was unaware of the need to do so. Could you please provide me with more details about the package and why it has been in their custody for so long?

I would also like to know what the USD fee is for and if there are any other payment options available besides Apple card or steam wallet card. Additionally, could you clarify who Mr. James Ben is and how he is related to my payment?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Diane
